```{r}
library(tidyverse) 
library(shinysense)
dates <- seq(as.Date("2017/1/1"), as.Date("2017/07/22"), "weeks")
numWeeks <- length(dates)
endDate <- dates[15]
timeData <- data_frame(
  date = dates,
  value = 50 + (1:numWeeks) * cos((1:numWeeks) / 6) + rnorm(numWeeks)
)

drawr_widget(
  data = timeData,
  draw_start = endDate,
  x_key = "date",
  y_key = "value",
  width="100%"
)
```


```{r}
shinydrawrUI("outbreak_stats")
drawChart <- shiny::callModule(shinydrawr,
                               "outbreak_stats",
                               data = timeData,
                               draw_start = endDate,
                               x_key = "date",
                               y_key = "value")
```
